trans-unit.source: Returns True if the given key is set. This lets you do, e.g., if "foo" in request.GET.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了给定的键，则返回 True 。例如，这可以让您执行 if "foo" in request.GET 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the given raw string is the correct password for the user. (This takes care of the password hashing in making the comparison.)
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的原始字符串是用户的正确密码，则返回 True 。（这在进行比较时会考虑密码哈希。）

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the request Accept header matches the mime_type argument:
trans-unit.target: 如果请求 Accept 标头与 mime_type 参数匹配，则返回 True ：

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the request is secure; that is, if it was made with HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求是安全的，则返回 True ;否则，返回false。也就是说，如果它是使用HTTPS制作的。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the request was made via an XMLHttpRequest, by checking the HTTP_X_REQUESTED_WITH header for the string 'XMLHttpRequest'. Most modern JavaScript libraries send this header. If you write your own XMLHttpRequest call (on the browser side), you’ll have to set this header manually if you want is_ajax() to work.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过 XMLHttpRequest 发出请求，则通过检查字符串 'XMLHttpRequest' 的 HTTP_X_REQUESTED_WITH 标头，返回 True 。大多数现代的JavaScript库都发送此标头。如果您编写自己的 XMLHttpRequest 调用（在浏览器端），则要使 is_ajax() 工作，必须手动设置此标头。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the uploaded file is big enough to require reading in multiple chunks. By default this will be any file larger than 2.5 megabytes, but that’s configurable; see below.
trans-unit.target: 如果上传的文件足够大，需要读取多个块，则返回 True 。默认情况下，它将是任何大于2.5兆字节的文件，但这是可配置的。见下文。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user account is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户帐户当前处于活动状态，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user for the given HttpRequest has permission to view at least one page in the admin site. Defaults to requiring both User.is_active and User.is_staff to be True.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 HttpRequest 的用户有权查看管理站点中的至少一页，则返回 True 。默认为既需要 User.is_active 和 User.is_staff 是 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user has any permissions in the given package (the Django app label). If User.is_active and is_superuser are both True, this method always returns True.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户在给定的程序包（Django应用程序标签）中具有任何权限，则返回 True 。如果 User.is_active 和 is_superuser 均为 True ，则此方法始终返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user has any permissions in the given package (the Django app label). If the user is inactive, this method will always return False. For an active superuser, this method will always return True.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户在给定的程序包（Django应用程序标签）中具有任何权限，则返回 True 。如果用户不活跃，则此方法将始终返回 False 。对于活动的超级用户，此方法将始终返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user has each of the specified permissions, where each perm is in the format "<app label>.<permission codename>". If User.is_active and is_superuser are both True, this method always returns True.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户具有每个指定的权限（每个权限的格式为 "<app label>.<permission codename>" ，则返回 True 。如果 User.is_active 和 is_superuser 均为 True ，则此方法始终返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user has each of the specified permissions, where each perm is in the format "<app label>.<permission codename>". If the user is inactive, this method will always return False. For an active superuser, this method will always return True.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户具有每个指定的权限（每个权限的格式为 "<app label>.<permission codename>" ，则返回 True 。如果用户不活跃，则此方法将始终返回 False 。对于活动的超级用户，此方法将始终返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user has permission to access models in the given app.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户有权访问给定应用程序中的模型，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user has the named permission. If obj is provided, the permission needs to be checked against a specific object instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户具有命名权限，则返回 True 。如果提供了 obj ，则需要针对特定​​的对象实例检查权限。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user has the specified permission, where perm is in the format "<app label>.<permission codename>" (see permissions). If User.is_active and is_superuser are both True, this method always returns True.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户具有指定的许可权，则返回 True ，其中 perm 的格式为 "<app label>.<permission codename>" （请参阅permissions）。如果 User.is_active 和 is_superuser 均为 True ，则此方法始终返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user has the specified permission, where perm is in the format "<app label>.<permission codename>". (see documentation on permissions). If the user is inactive, this method will always return False. For an active superuser, this method will always return True.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户具有指定的许可权，则返回 True ，其中perm的格式为 "<app label>.<permission codename>" 。（请参阅有关权限的文档）。如果用户不活跃，则此方法将始终返回 False 。对于活动的超级用户，此方法将始终返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the user is allowed to have access to the admin site.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许用户访问管理站点，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the value is divisible by the argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值可被参数整除，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the value’s length is the argument, or False otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果值的长度是参数，则返回 True ,否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if there’s a next or previous page.
trans-unit.target: 如果有下一页或上一页，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if there’s a next page.
trans-unit.target: 如果有下一页，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if there’s a previous page.
trans-unit.target: 如果有上一页，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this BoundField’s widget is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 BoundField 的小部件被隐藏，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this geometry contains the other, otherwise returns False.
trans-unit.target: 返回 True ，如果这个几何体包含了其他，否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this geometry covers the specified geometry.
trans-unit.target: 如果此几何覆盖指定的几何，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this geometry crosses the other, otherwise returns False.
trans-unit.target: 返回 True ，如果这个几何越过其他，否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this geometry intersects the other, otherwise returns False.
trans-unit.target: 返回 True ，如果这个几何相交的其他，否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this geometry is contained within the other, otherwise returns False.
trans-unit.target: 返回 True ，如果这个几何体包含在其他内，否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this geometry is equivalent to the other, otherwise returns False.
trans-unit.target: 返回 True ，如果这种几何等同于其他的，否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this geometry is spatially disjoint to (i.e. does not intersect) the other, otherwise returns False.
trans-unit.target: 返回 True ，如果这个几何空间上不相交（即不相交）其他，否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this geometry overlaps the other, otherwise returns False.
trans-unit.target: 返回 True ，如果这个几何重叠等，否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this geometry touches the other, otherwise returns False.
trans-unit.target: 返回 True ，如果这个几何触及对方，否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this spatial reference is a projected coordinate system (root node is PROJCS).
trans-unit.target: 如果此空间参考是投影坐标系（根节点为 PROJCS ），则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this spatial reference is geographic (root node is GEOGCS).
trans-unit.target: 如果此空间参考是地理坐标（根节点是 GEOGCS ），则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if this spatial reference is local (root node is LOCAL_CS).
trans-unit.target: 如果此空间参考是本地的（根节点为 LOCAL_CS ），则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True or False based on a case-insensitive check for a header with the given name.
trans-unit.target: 基于不区分大小写的具有给定名称的标头检查，返回 True 或 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True to activate the filtering in get_post_parameters() and get_traceback_frame_variables(). By default the filter is active if DEBUG is False. Note that sensitive request.META values are always filtered along with sensitive setting values, as described in the DEBUG documentation.
trans-unit.target: 返回 True 以激活 get_post_parameters() 和 get_traceback_frame_variables() 中的过滤。默认情况下，如果 DEBUG 为 False ,则过滤器处于活动状态。请注意，敏感的 request.META 值总是与敏感的设置值一起过滤，如 DEBUG 文档中所述。

trans-unit.source: Returns True to activate the filtering operated in the other methods. By default the filter is active if DEBUG is False.
trans-unit.target: 返回 True 以激活其他方法中操作的过滤。默认情况下，如果 DEBUG 为 False ,则过滤器处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns True, if all input values are true, None if all values are null or if there are no values, otherwise False .
trans-unit.target: 如果所有输入值均为true，则返回 True ；如果所有值均为null或没有值，则返回 None ，否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns lang_code if it’s in the LANGUAGES setting, possibly selecting a more generic variant. For example, 'es' is returned if lang_code is 'es-ar' and 'es' is in LANGUAGES but 'es-ar' isn’t.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 LANGUAGES 设置中，则返回 lang_code ，可能会选择一个更通用的变体。例如， 'es' 如果返回 lang_code 是 'es-ar' 和 'es' 是 LANGUAGES ，但 'es-ar' 不。

trans-unit.source: Returns objs as cast to a list, in the same order as provided.
trans-unit.target: 以提供的顺序将 objs 转换为列表返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns self with any modifications required to reverse the sort order within an order_by call. As an example, an expression implementing NULLS LAST would change its value to be NULLS FIRST. Modifications are only required for expressions that implement sort order like OrderBy. This method is called when reverse() is called on a queryset.
trans-unit.target: 返回 self 并进行颠倒 order_by 调用中的排序顺序所需的任何修改。例如，实现 NULLS LAST 的表达式会将其值更改为 NULLS FIRST 。只有实现排序顺序（如 OrderBy )的表达式才需要修改。在查询集上调用 reverse() 时,将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns sum(x*y) - sum(x) * sum(y)/N (“sum of products” of independent times dependent variable) as a float, or None if there aren’t any matching rows.
trans-unit.target: 以 float 形式返回 sum(x*y) - sum(x) * sum(y)/N （独立时间因变量的“乘积之和”），如果没有匹配的行，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Returns sum(x^2) - sum(x)^2/N (“sum of squares” of the independent variable) as a float, or None if there aren’t any matching rows.
trans-unit.target: 以 float 形式返回 sum(x^2) - sum(x)^2/N （自变量的“平方和”），如果没有匹配的行，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Returns sum(y^2) - sum(y)^2/N (“sum of squares” of the dependent variable) as a float, or None if there aren’t any matching rows.
trans-unit.target: 以 float 形式返回 sum(y^2) - sum(y)^2/N （因变量的“平方和”），如果没有匹配的行，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Returns URL-safe, sha1 signed base64 compressed JSON string. Serialized object is signed using TimestampSigner.
trans-unit.target: 返回URL安全，sha1签名的base64压缩JSON字符串。序列化的对象使用 TimestampSigner 签名。

trans-unit.source: Returns URL-safe, signed base64 compressed JSON string. Serialized object is signed using TimestampSigner.
trans-unit.target: 返回URL安全的，签名的base64压缩JSON字符串。序列化的对象使用 TimestampSigner 签名。

trans-unit.source: Returns WKB of the geometry in hexadecimal. Example:
trans-unit.target: 返回十六进制的几何体的WKB。例子。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 2-tuple of the units value and the units name and will automatically determines whether to return the linear or angular units.
trans-unit.target: 返回单位值和单位名称的2-tuple,并将自动决定返回线性单位还是角度单位。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 3-tuple containing (date_list, object_list, extra_context).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含（ date_list ， object_list ， extra_context ）的三元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 4-tuple containing (paginator, page, object_list, is_paginated).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含（ paginator ， page ， object_list ， is_paginated ）的4元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 4-tuple with enough information to recreate the field:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含足够信息的4-tuple来重新创建字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Point representing the centroid of this polygon.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此多边形质心的 Point 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GEOSGeometry combining the points in this geometry not in other, and the points in other not in this geometry.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 GEOSGeometry ,它组合了该几何图形中不在其他几何图形中的点和其他几何图形中不在这些几何图形中的点。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GEOSGeometry representing all the points in this geometry and the other.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 GEOSGeometry ,表示该几何图形中的所有点以及另一个。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GEOSGeometry representing the points making up this geometry that do not make up other.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 GEOSGeometry ,它表示组成此几何图形且不组成其他图形的点。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GEOSGeometry representing the points shared by this geometry and other.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 GEOSGeometry ,表示该几何图形和其他几何图形共享的点。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GEOSGeometry that represents all points whose distance from this geometry is less than or equal to the given width. The optional quadsegs keyword sets the number of segments used to approximate a quarter circle (defaults is 8).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 GEOSGeometry ，它表示与该几何形状的距离小于或等于给定 width 所有点。可选的 quadsegs 关键字设置用于近似四分之一圆的段数（默认为8）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a LineString representing the line merge of all the components in this MultiLineString.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 LineString ,表示此 MultiLineString 中所有组件的线合并。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Point object representing the geometric center of the geometry. The point is not guaranteed to be on the interior of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 Point 对象，该对象表示几何的几何中心。该点不能保证位于几何图形的内部。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Polygon that represents the bounding envelope of this geometry. Note that it can also return a Point if the input geometry is a point.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此几何图形的边界包络的 Polygon 。请注意，如果输入几何是点，则它也可以返回 Point 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Page object with the given 1-based index, while also handling out of range and invalid page numbers.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有给定的基于1的索引的 Page 对象，同时还处理超出范围和无效的页码。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Page object with the given 1-based index. Raises InvalidPage if the given page number doesn’t exist.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有给定的基于1的索引的 Page 对象。如果给定的页码不存在，则引发 InvalidPage 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a RegexValidator instance that ensures a string consists of integers separated by sep. It allows negative integers when allow_negative is True.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 RegexValidator 实例，该实例确保字符串包含由 sep 分隔的整数。当 allow_negative 为 True 时，它允许使用负整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Transform named transform_name. The default implementation looks recursively on all parent classes to check if any has the registered transform named transform_name, returning the first match.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个名为 transform_name 的 Transform 。默认实现对所有父类进行递归查找，以检查是否有已注册的名为 transform_name 的转换，并返回第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a ModelForm class for use in the Formset on the changelist page. To use a custom form, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个供在变更列表页面上的 Formset 中使用的 ModelForm 类。要使用自定义表单，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a ModelForm class for use in the admin add and change views, see add_view() and change_view().
trans-unit.target: 返回要在管理员添加和更改视图中使用的 ModelForm 类，请参见 add_view() 和 change_view() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a BaseInlineFormSet class for use in admin add/change views. obj is the parent object being edited or None when adding a new parent. See the example for ModelAdmin.get_formsets_with_inlines.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个在管理添加/更改视图中使用的 BaseInlineFormSet 类。 obj 是正在编辑的父对象，或者是添加新父对象时为 None 。请参见 ModelAdmin.get_formsets_with_inlines 的示例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a ModelFormSet class for use on the changelist page if list_editable is used. To use a custom formset, for example:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 list_editable ,则返回要在变更列表页面上使用的ModelFormSet类。要使用自定义表单集，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a ModelForm class for the given model. You can optionally pass a form argument to use as a starting point for constructing the ModelForm.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定 model 的 ModelForm 类。您可以选择传递一个 form 参数以用作构造 ModelForm 的起点。

trans-unit.source: Returns a SpatialReference object corresponding to the SRID of the geometry or None.
trans-unit.target: 返回对应于几何的SRID或 None 的 SpatialReference 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GEOSGeometry object corresponding to this geometry.
trans-unit.target: 返回与此几何对应的 GEOSGeometry 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Point object corresponding to the query.
trans-unit.target: 返回与查询相对应的 Point 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a KML (Keyhole Markup Language) representation of the geometry. This should only be used for geometries with an SRID of 4326 (WGS84), but this restriction is not enforced.
trans-unit.target: 返回几何的KML（锁孔标记语言）表示形式。这仅应用于SRID为4326（WGS84）的几何，但不强制执行此限制。

trans-unit.source: Returns a datetime of the creation time of the file. For storage systems unable to return the creation time this will raise NotImplementedError.
trans-unit.target: 返回文件创建时间的 datetime 时间。对于无法返回创建时间的存储系统，这将引发 NotImplementedError 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a datetime of the last accessed time of the file. For storage systems unable to return the last accessed time this will raise NotImplementedError.
trans-unit.target: 返回文件的上次访问时间的 datetime 时间。对于无法返回上次访问时间的存储系统，这将引发 NotImplementedError 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a datetime of the last modified time of the file. For storage systems unable to return the last modified time this will raise NotImplementedError.
trans-unit.target: 返回文件的最后修改时间的 datetime 时间。对于无法返回上次修改时间的存储系统，这将引发 NotImplementedError 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a datetime of the system’s ctime, i.e. os.path.getctime(). On some systems (like Unix), this is the time of the last metadata change, and on others (like Windows), it’s the creation time of the file.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统ctime 的 datetime 时间，即 os.path.getctime() 。在某些系统（例如Unix）上，这是最后一次元数据更改的时间，而在其他系统（例如Windows）上，这是文件的创建时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a datetime that represents the current point in time. Exactly what’s returned depends on the value of USE_TZ:
trans-unit.target: 返回代表当前时间点的 datetime 时间。确切地返回什么取决于 USE_TZ 的值：

trans-unit.source: Returns a tzinfo instance that represents a time zone with a fixed offset from UTC.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 tzinfo 实例，该实例表示与UTC有固定偏移量的时区。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tzinfo instance that represents the current time zone.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示当前时区的 tzinfo 实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tzinfo instance that represents the default time zone.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示默认时区的 tzinfo 实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a CommandParser instance, which is an ArgumentParser subclass with a few customizations for Django.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 CommandParser 实例，它是一个 ArgumentParser 子类，具有针对Django的一些自定义项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a FormSet class for the given form class.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定 form 类的 FormSet 类。

trans-unit.source: Returns a FormSet class for the given model class.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定 model 类的 FormSet 类。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GEOMETRYCOLLECTION or a MULTI geometry object from the geometry column. This is analogous to a simplified version of the Union aggregate, except it can be several orders of magnitude faster than performing a union because it rolls up geometries into a collection or multi object, not caring about dissolving boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 从几何列返回 GEOMETRYCOLLECTION 或 MULTI 几何对象。这类似于 Union 聚合的简化版本，除了它可以比执行Union快几个数量级，因为它可以将几何形状汇总到集合或多对象中，而无需考虑消除边界。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GenericInlineFormSet using modelformset_factory().
trans-unit.target: 使用 modelformset_factory() 返回 GenericInlineFormSet 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a LineString constructed from the point field geometries in the QuerySet. Currently, ordering the queryset has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 返回根据 QuerySet 中的点字段几何构造的 LineString 。当前，排序查询集无效。

trans-unit.source: Returns a QuerySet that evaluates to a list of datetime.date objects representing all available dates of a particular kind within the contents of the QuerySet.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 QuerySet ，其结果为 datetime.date 对象的列表，这些对象表示 QuerySet 内容内所有特定类型的可用日期。

trans-unit.source: Returns a QuerySet that evaluates to a list of datetime.datetime objects representing all available dates of a particular kind within the contents of the QuerySet.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 QuerySet ，其结果为 datetime.datetime 对象的列表，这些对象表示 QuerySet 内容内所有特定类型的可用日期。

trans-unit.source: Returns a QuerySet that returns dictionaries, rather than model instances, when used as an iterable.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个用作迭代的 QuerySet ，它返回字典而不是模型实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a QuerySet that will “follow” foreign-key relationships, selecting additional related-object data when it executes its query. This is a performance booster which results in a single more complex query but means later use of foreign-key relationships won’t require database queries.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 QuerySet ，它将“遵循”外键关系，并在执行查询时选择其他相关对象数据。这可以提高性能，从而导致单个更复杂的查询，但意味着以后使用外键关系将不需要数据库查询。

trans-unit.source: Returns a QuerySet that will automatically retrieve, in a single batch, related objects for each of the specified lookups.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 QuerySet ，该查询集将自动为每个指定的查询分批检索相关对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Template object for a given template_name by looping through results from get_template_sources() and calling get_contents(). This returns the first matching template. If no template is found, TemplateDoesNotExist is raised.
trans-unit.target: 通过遍历 get_template_sources() 的结果并调用 get_contents() ,返回给定 template_name 的 Template 对象。这将返回第一个匹配的模板。如果找不到模板，则引发 TemplateDoesNotExist 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a TestSuite instance ready to be run.
trans-unit.target: 返回准备运行的 TestSuite 实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a buffer containing a WKB representation of this geometry.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含此几何的WKB表示形式的 buffer 。

trans-unit.target: 返回 QueryDict 的 dict 表示形式。对于 QueryDict 中的每个（键，列表）对， dict 将具有（键，项目），其中item是列表的一个元素，使用与 QueryDict.__getitem__() 相同的逻辑：

trans-unit.source: Returns a dict that maps fields to their original ValidationError instances.
trans-unit.target: 返回将字段映射到其原始 ValidationError 实例的 dict 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a self.response_class instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 self.response_class 实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a str object representing arbitrary object s. Treats bytestrings using the encoding codec.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示任意对象 s 的 str 对象。使用 encoding 编解码器处理字节串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the current QuerySet (or QuerySet subclass). This can be useful in situations where you might want to pass in either a model manager or a QuerySet and do further filtering on the result. After calling all() on either object, you’ll definitely have a QuerySet to work with.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 QuerySet （或 QuerySet 子类）的副本。在您可能想要传递模型管理器或 QuerySet 并对结果进行进一步过滤的情况下，这很有用。在任何一个对象上调用 all() 之后，您肯定会有一个 QuerySet 可以使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GEOS PreparedGeometry for the contents of this geometry. PreparedGeometry objects are optimized for the contains, intersects, covers, crosses, disjoint, overlaps, touches and within operations. Refer to the Prepared Geometries documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: 返回此几何内容的GEOS PreparedGeometry 。 PreparedGeometry 对象针对包含，相交，覆盖，交叉，不相交，重叠，接触和操作内进行了优化。有关更多信息，请参考“ 准备好的几何图形”文档。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean denoting whether the current user has permission to execute the decorated view. By default, this returns the result of calling has_perms() with the list of permissions returned by get_permission_required().
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示当前用户是否有权执行装饰的视图。默认情况下，该调用返回的结果 has_perms() 与返回的权限列表 get_permission_required() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the geometry is ‘simple’. A geometry is simple if and only if it does not intersect itself (except at boundary points). For example, a LineString object is not simple if it intersects itself. Thus, LinearRing and Polygon objects are always simple because they do cannot intersect themselves, by definition.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示几何形状是否为“简单”。当且仅当几何体自身不相交时（边界点除外），几何体才是简单的。例如，如果 LineString 对象与自身相交，则它并不简单。因此， LinearRing 和 Polygon 对象始终很简单，因为根据定义它们不会相交。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the geometry is a LinearRing.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示几何图形是否为 LinearRing 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the geometry is three-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示几何体是否为三维的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether the geometry is valid.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示几何体是否有效的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean indicating whether this layer supports the given capability (a string). Examples of valid capability strings include: 'RandomRead', 'SequentialWrite', 'RandomWrite', 'FastSpatialFilter', 'FastFeatureCount', 'FastGetExtent', 'CreateField', 'Transactions', 'DeleteFeature', and 'FastSetNextByIndex'.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指示该层是否支持给定的功能（字符串）。有效功能字符串的示例包括： 'RandomRead' ， 'SequentialWrite' ， 'RandomWrite' ， 'FastSpatialFilter' ， 'FastFeatureCount' ， 'FastGetExtent' ， 'CreateField' ， 'Transactions' ， 'DeleteFeature' 和 'FastSetNextByIndex' 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a bytestring version of arbitrary object s, encoded as specified in encoding.
trans-unit.target: 返回任意对象 s 的字节串版本，按 encoding 的指定进行编码。

trans-unit.source: Returns a cache key based on the request path. It can be used in the request phase because it pulls the list of headers to take into account from the global path registry and uses those to build a cache key to check against.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个基于请求路径的缓存密钥。它可以在请求阶段使用,因为它从全局路径注册表中提取要考虑的头文件列表,并使用这些头文件来建立一个缓存密钥来进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Returns a callable view that takes a request and returns a response:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个接受请求并返回响应的可调用视图。

trans-unit.source: Returns a class or module which implements the storage API.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个实现存储API的类或模块。

trans-unit.source: Returns a clone (copy) of self, with any column aliases relabeled. Column aliases are renamed when subqueries are created. relabeled_clone() should also be called on any nested expressions and assigned to the clone.
trans-unit.target: 返回 self 的克隆（副本），并重新标记任何列别名。创建子查询时，将重命名列别名。还应在任何嵌套表达式上调用 relabeled_clone() 并将其分配给克隆。

trans-unit.source: Returns a clone of this spatial reference object.
trans-unit.target: 返回此空间参考对象的克隆。

trans-unit.source: Returns a context manager which, when entered, installs a wrapper around database query executions, and when exited, removes the wrapper. The wrapper is installed on the thread-local connection object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个上下文管理器,当输入时,该上下文管理器会围绕数据库查询执行安装一个封装器,当退出时,会删除该封装器。包装器安装在线程本地连接对象上。

trans-unit.source: Returns a cookie value for a signed cookie, or raises a django.core.signing.BadSignature exception if the signature is no longer valid. If you provide the default argument the exception will be suppressed and that default value will be returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回签名的cookie的cookie值，或者如果签名不再有效，则 django.core.signing.BadSignature 异常。如果提供 default 参数，则将抑制该异常，并将改为返回该默认值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a coordinate tuple of (latitude, longitude),
trans-unit.target: 返回(经纬度)的坐标元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a coordinate tuple of (longitude, latitude).
trans-unit.target: 返回(经度,纬度)的坐标元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the object using copy.deepcopy(). This copy will be mutable even if the original was not.
trans-unit.target: 使用 copy.deepcopy() 返回对象的副本。即使原件不是，此副本也将是可变的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a data structure that provides enough detail to undo the changes that have been made. This data will be provided to the teardown_databases() function at the conclusion of testing.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数据结构，该结构提供足够的详细信息以撤消已进行的更改。测试结束时，此数据将提供给 teardown_databases() 函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a date object containing the first day of the month after the date provided. This function can also return None or raise an Http404 exception, depending on the values of allow_empty and allow_future.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个日期对象，该对象包含提供的日期之后的月份的第一天。此函数还可以返回 None 或引发 Http404 异常，具体取决于 allow_empty 和 allow_future 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a date object containing the first day of the month before the date provided. This function can also return None or raise an Http404 exception, depending on the values of allow_empty and allow_future.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个日期对象，该对象包含所提供日期之前的月份的第一天。此函数还可以返回 None 或引发 Http404 异常，具体取决于 allow_empty 和 allow_future 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a date object containing the first day of the week after the date provided. This function can also return None or raise an Http404 exception, depending on the values of allow_empty and allow_future.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个日期对象，该对象包含提供的日期之后一周中的第一天。此函数还可以返回 None 或引发 Http404 异常，具体取决于 allow_empty 和 allow_future 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a date object containing the first day of the week before the date provided. This function can also return None or raise an Http404 exception, depending on the values of allow_empty and allow_future.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个日期对象，该对象包含提供的日期之前一周中的第一天。此函数还可以返回 None 或引发 Http404 异常，具体取决于 allow_empty 和 allow_future 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a date object containing the first day of the year after the date provided. This function can also return None or raise an Http404 exception, depending on the values of allow_empty and allow_future.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个日期对象，该对象包含提供的日期之后一年中的第一天。此函数还可以返回 None 或引发 Http404 异常，具体取决于 allow_empty 和 allow_future 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a date object containing the first day of the year before the date provided. This function can also return None or raise an Http404 exception, depending on the values of allow_empty and allow_future.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个日期对象，该对象包含提供的日期之前一年中的第一天。此函数还可以返回 None 或引发 Http404 异常，具体取决于 allow_empty 和 allow_future 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a date object containing the next valid day after the date provided. This function can also return None or raise an Http404 exception, depending on the values of allow_empty and allow_future.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个日期对象，其中包含提供的日期之后的下一个有效日期。此函数还可以返回 None 或引发 Http404 异常，具体取决于 allow_empty 和 allow_future 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a date object containing the previous valid day. This function can also return None or raise an Http404 exception, depending on the values of allow_empty and allow_future.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含前一个有效日期的日期对象。此函数还可以返回 None 或引发 Http404 异常，具体取决于 allow_empty 和 allow_future 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a dictionary of aggregate values (averages, sums, etc.) calculated over the QuerySet. Each argument to aggregate() specifies a value that will be included in the dictionary that is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回在 QuerySet 上计算的聚合值（平均值，总和等）的字典。 aggregate() 每个参数都指定一个值，该值将包含在返回的字典中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a dictionary of city information for the given query. Some of the values in the dictionary may be undefined (None).
trans-unit.target: 返回给定查询的城市信息字典。字典中的某些值可能未定义（ None ）。

trans-unit.target: Returns a dictionary of variables to put in the template context for every page in the admin site.

trans-unit.source: Returns a dictionary representing the template context. The keyword arguments provided will make up the returned context. Example usage:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表模板上下文的字典。提供的关键字参数将构成返回的上下文。使用示例。

trans-unit.target: 返回给定查询的国家代码和国家的字典。

trans-unit.source: Returns a filename based on the name parameter that’s free and available for new content to be written to on the target storage system.
trans-unit.target: 根据 name 参数返回一个文件名，该文件名是免费的，可用于将新内容写入目标存储系统。

trans-unit.source: Returns a filename based on the name parameter that’s suitable for use on the target storage system.
trans-unit.target: 根据适合在目标存储系统上使用的 name 参数返回文件名。

trans-unit.source: Returns a filename suitable for use with the underlying storage system. The name argument passed to this method is either the original filename sent to the server or, if upload_to is a callable, the filename returned by that method after any path information is removed. Override this to customize how non-standard characters are converted to safe filenames.
trans-unit.target: 返回适合与基础存储系统一起使用的文件名。传递给此方法的 name 参数是发送到服务器的原始文件名，或者，如果 upload_to 是可调用的，则是除去任何路径信息后该方法返回的文件名。覆盖此选项可自定义如何将非标准字符转换为安全文件名。

trans-unit.source: Returns a filename that is available in the storage mechanism, possibly taking the provided filename into account. The name argument passed to this method will have already cleaned to a filename valid for the storage system, according to the get_valid_name() method described above.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储机制中可用的文件名，可能考虑了提供的文件名。根据上述的 get_valid_name() 方法，传递给此方法的 name 参数将已经清除为对存储系统有效的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Returns a float between 0 and 1 representing the location of the closest point on linestring to the given point, as a fraction of the 2D line length.
trans-unit.target: 返回介于0和1之间的浮点数，表示 linestring 上与给 point 最近的点的位置，以2D线长度的一部分表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of X coordinates in this line:
trans-unit.target: 返回此行的X坐标列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of Y coordinates in this line:
trans-unit.target: 返回此行的Y坐标列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of Z coordinates in this line, or None if the line does not have Z coordinates:
trans-unit.target: 返回此行中Z坐标的列表；如果该行没有Z坐标，则返回 None ：

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of template names to search for when rendering the template. The first template that is found will be used.
trans-unit.target: 返回渲染模板时要搜索的模板名称列表。找到的第一个模板将被使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the data types of each of the fields in this layer. These are subclasses of Field, discussed below:
trans-unit.target: 返回此层中每个字段的数据类型的列表。这些是 Field 的子类，下面讨论：

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the data with the requested key. Returns an empty list if the key doesn’t exist and default is None. It’s guaranteed to return a list unless the default value provided isn’t a list.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有请求密钥的数据列表。如果键不存在且 default 值为 None ,则返回一个空列表。除非提供的默认值不是列表，否则保证返回列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the data with the requested key. Returns an empty list if the key doesn’t exist and a default value wasn’t provided. It’s guaranteed to return a list unless the default value provided isn’t a list.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有请求密钥的数据列表。如果键不存在且未提供默认值，则返回一个空列表。除非提供的默认值不是列表，否则保证返回列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the help texts of all validators. These explain the password requirements to the user.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有验证器的帮助文本列表。这些帮助文本向用户解释了密码要求。

trans-unit.target: 返回该层中每个字段的最大字段宽度列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the names of each of the fields in this layer:
trans-unit.target: 返回该层中每个字段的名称列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the names of the fields of data associated with the feature. This will be the same for all features in a given layer and is equivalent to the Layer.fields property of the Layer object the feature came from.
trans-unit.target: 返回与功能关联的数据字段名称的列表。对于给定图层中的所有 Layer.fields ，这都是相同的，并且等效于要素所来自的 Layer 对象的Layer.fields属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the numeric precisions for each of the fields in this layer. This is meaningless (and set to zero) for non-numeric fields:
trans-unit.target: 返回本层中每个字段的数值精度列表。对于非数字字段来说,这是没有意义的(并设置为零)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of values for the given key and removes them from the dictionary. Raises KeyError if the key does not exist. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回给定键的值列表，并将其从字典中删除。如果键不存在，则引发 KeyError 。例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of values, including nulls, concatenated into an array.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值的列表,包括空值,连接成一个数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a naive datetime that represents in timezone the same point in time as value, value being an aware datetime. If timezone is set to None, it defaults to the current time zone.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个朴素的 datetime 时间，该 datetime 时间在 timezone 中表示与 value 相同的时间点， value 是可感知的datetime。如果 timezone 设置为 None ，则默认为当前时区。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new OGRGeometry clone of this geometry object.
trans-unit.target: 返回此几何对象的新 OGRGeometry 克隆。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new GEOSGeometry, simplified to the specified tolerance using the Douglas-Peucker algorithm. A higher tolerance value implies fewer points in the output. If no tolerance is provided, it defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 GEOSGeometry ，使用Douglas-Peucker算法简化为指定的公差。较高的容差值意味着输出中的点较少。如果未提供公差，则默认为0。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new QuerySet containing objects that do not match the given lookup parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 QuerySet ,其中包含与给定的查找参数不匹配的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new QuerySet containing objects that match the given lookup parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 QuerySet ,其中包含与给定查找参数匹配的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new QuerySet containing objects that do not match the given lookup parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 QuerySet ,其中包含与给定的查找参数不匹配的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new QuerySet containing objects that match the given lookup parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 QuerySet ,其中包含与给定查找参数匹配的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new QuerySet that uses SELECT DISTINCT in its SQL query. This eliminates duplicate rows from the query results.
trans-unit.target: 返回在其SQL查询中使用 SELECT DISTINCT 的新 QuerySet 。这样可以从查询结果中消除重复的行。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the session model object, which represents the current session state.
trans-unit.target: 返回代表当前会话状态的会话模型对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a plural suffix if the value is not 1, '1', or an object of length 1. By default, this suffix is 's'.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不是 1 ， '1' 或长度为1的对象，则返回复数后缀。默认情况下，此后缀为 's' 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a polygon object from the given bounding-box, a 4-tuple comprising (xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax).
trans-unit.target: 从给定的边界框中返回一个多边形对象，该对象是一个由 (xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax) 组成的4元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a positive integer corresponding to the 1-indexed position of the first occurrence of substring inside string, or 0 if substring is not found.
trans-unit.target: 返回对应的第一次出现的1转位位置的正整数 substring 内 string ，或0，如果 substring 是找不到的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a queryset that will lock rows until the end of the transaction, generating a SELECT ... FOR UPDATE SQL statement on supported databases.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个查询集，该查询集将锁定行直到事务结束，从而在支持的数据库上生成 SELECT ... FOR UPDATE SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: Returns a queryset, filtered using the query arguments defined by lookup. Enforces any restrictions on the queryset, such as allow_empty and allow_future.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个查询集，该查询集使用 lookup 定义的查询参数进行过滤。对查询集实施任何限制，例如 allow_empty 和 allow_future 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a random item from the given list.
trans-unit.target: 从给定列表中随机返回一个项目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a random password with the given length and given string of allowed characters. Note that the default value of allowed_chars doesn’t contain letters that can cause user confusion, including:
trans-unit.target: 返回具有给定长度和给定字符串允许字符的随机密码。请注意， allowed_chars 的默认值不包含会引起用户混乱的字母，包括：

trans-unit.source: Returns a session store class to be used with this session model.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个与这个会话模型一起使用的会话存储类。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of permission strings that the user has directly.
trans-unit.target: 返回用户直接拥有的一组权限字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of permission strings that the user has, both through group and user permissions.
trans-unit.target: 返回用户拥有的一组权限字符串,包括通过组和用户的权限。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of permission strings that the user has, through their groups.
trans-unit.target: 返回用户通过他们的组拥有的一组权限字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of validator objects based on the validator_config parameter. By default, all functions use the validators defined in AUTH_PASSWORD_VALIDATORS, but by calling this function with an alternate set of validators and then passing the result into the password_validators parameter of the other functions, your custom set of validators will be used instead. This is useful when you have a typical set of validators to use for most scenarios, but also have a special situation that requires a custom set. If you always use the same set of validators, there is no need to use this function, as the configuration from AUTH_PASSWORD_VALIDATORS is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 根据 validator_config 参数返回一组验证器对象。默认情况下，所有函数都使用 AUTH_PASSWORD_VALIDATORS 中定义的验证器，但是通过使用另一组验证器调用此函数，然后将结果传递到其他函数的 password_validators 参数中，将改为使用自定义的验证器集。当您有一组用于大多数情况的典型验证器，但又有需要自定义集的特殊情况时，这很有用。如果您始终使用同一组验证器，则无需使用此功能，因为默认情况下使用 AUTH_PASSWORD_VALIDATORS 的配置。

trans-unit.target: 返回长度的子串 length 从场或表达起始于位置 pos 。该位置为1索引，因此该位置必须大于0。如果 length 为 None ，则将返回字符串的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: Returns an AppConfig for the application with the given app_label. Raises LookupError if no such application exists.

trans-unit.target: 返回一个 InlineFormSet 使用 modelformset_factory() 具有默认值 formset= BaseInlineFormSet ， can_delete=True ，和 extra=3 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an int of the bitwise AND of all non-null input values, or None if all values are null.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有非空输入值的按位 AND 的 int 值；如果所有值均为空，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an int of the bitwise OR of all non-null input values, or None if all values are null.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有非空输入值的按位 OR 的 int ，如果所有值都为空，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an int of the number of input rows in which both expressions are not null.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个表达式都不为空的输入行数的 int 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ASCII string containing the encoded result.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含编码结果的ASCII字符串。

trans-unit.target: 返回 True 或 False ，具体取决于用户的浏览器是否接受了测试Cookie。由于Cookie的工作方式，您必须在上一个单独的页面请求上调用 set_test_cookie() 。有关更多信息，请参见下面的设置测试Cookie。

Note that you can only provide Distance objects if the targeted geometries are in a projected system. For geographic geometries, you should use units of the geometry field (e.g. degrees for WGS84) .

trans-unit.target: 返回或设置与此几何图形的 SpatialReference 相对应的空间参考标识符。如果没有与此几何关联的空间参考信息，或者无法确定SRID，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Returns selected language’s BiDi layout:
trans-unit.target: 返回所选语言的BiDi布局：

trans-unit.source: Returns the “extended” Well-Known Text of the geometry. This representation is specific to PostGIS and is a superset of the OGC WKT standard. [1] Essentially the SRID is prepended to the WKT representation, for example SRID=4326;POINT(5 23).
trans-unit.target: 返回几何的“扩展”熟知文本。此表示特定于PostGIS，并且是OGC WKT标准的超集。[1]本质上，SRID是WKT表示形式的前缀，例如 SRID=4326;POINT(5 23) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ‘pretty’ representation of the WKT.
trans-unit.target: 返回WKT的“漂亮”表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the 1-based index of the first object on the page, relative to all of the objects in the paginator’s list. For example, when paginating a list of 5 objects with 2 objects per page, the second page’s start_index() would return 3.
trans-unit.target: 返回页面上第一个对象相对于分页器列表中所有对象的从1开始的索引。例如，当将5个对象的列表分页（每页2个对象）时，第二页的 start_index() 将返回 3 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the 1-based index of the last object on the page, relative to all of the objects in the paginator’s list. For example, when paginating a list of 5 objects with 2 objects per page, the second page’s end_index() would return 4.
trans-unit.target: 返回页面上最后一个对象（相对于分页器列表中的所有对象）的从1开始的索引。例如，当将5个对象的列表分页（每页2个对象）时，第二页的 end_index() 将返回 4 。

trans-unit.target: 返回所有的3D程度 geo_field 在 QuerySet 为六元组，包括左下坐标和右上坐标（每个具有x，y和z坐标）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first_name plus the last_name, with a space in between.
trans-unit.target: 返回 first_name 和 last_name 之间的空格。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first_name.
trans-unit.target: 返回 first_name 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ContentType instance uniquely identified by the given application label and model name. The primary purpose of this method is to allow ContentType objects to be referenced via a natural key during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 返回由给定应用程序标签和模型名称唯一标识的 ContentType 实例。此方法的主要目的是允许在反序列化期间通过自然键引用 ContentType 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Lookup named lookup_name registered in the class. The default implementation looks recursively on all parent classes and checks if any has a registered lookup named lookup_name, returning the first match.
trans-unit.target: 返回在类中注册的名为 lookup_name 的 Lookup 。默认实现对所有父类进行递归查找，并检查是否有已注册的名为 lookup_name 的查找，并返回第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Returns the strftime() format to use when parsing the day. Returns day_format by default.
trans-unit.target: 返回解析日期时使用的 strftime() 格式。默认情况下返回 day_format 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the strftime() format to use when parsing the month. Returns month_format by default.
trans-unit.target: 返回解析月份时使用的 strftime() 格式。默认情况下返回 month_format 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the strftime() format to use when parsing the week. Returns week_format by default.
trans-unit.target: 返回解析星期时要使用的 strftime() 格式。默认情况下返回 week_format 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the strftime() format to use when parsing the year. Returns year_format by default.
trans-unit.target: 返回解析年份时使用的 strftime() 格式。默认情况下返回 year_format 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Model with the given app_label and model_name. As a shortcut, this method also accepts a single argument in the form app_label.model_name. model_name is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Model 与给定 app_label 和 model_name 。作为快捷方式，此方法还接受 app_label.model_name 形式的单个参数。 model_name 不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Model with the given model_name. model_name is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有给定 model_name 的 Model 。 model_name 不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Changelist class to be used for listing. By default, django.contrib.admin.views.main.ChangeList is used. By inheriting this class you can change the behavior of the listing.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于列表的 Changelist 类。默认情况下，使用 django.contrib.admin.views.main.ChangeList 。通过继承此类，您可以更改列表的行为。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path, plus an appended query string, if applicable.
trans-unit.target: 返回 path ，加上附加的查询字符串（如果适用）。

trans-unit.source: Reusability is the way of life in Python. The Python Package Index (PyPI) has a vast range of packages you can use in your own Python programs. Check out Django Packages for existing reusable apps you could incorporate in your project. Django itself is also a normal Python package. This means that you can take existing Python packages or Django apps and compose them into your own web project. You only need to write the parts that make your project unique.
trans-unit.target: 可重用性是Python中的一种生活方式。Python程序包索引（PyPI）具有广泛的程序包，您可以在自己的Python程序中使用它们。请查看Django软件包，以了解可以合并到项目中的现有可重用应用程序。Django本身也是一个普通的Python软件包。这意味着您可以将现有的Python软件包或Django应用程序组合成自己的Web项目。您只需要编写使项目独特的部分即可。

trans-unit.target: SQL保留字，如 join ， where 或 select ，被允许作为模型字段的名字，因为Django的转义每个底层的SQL查询的所有数据库表名和列名。它使用特定数据库引擎的引用语法。

trans-unit.source: SQLite imposes restrictions on how a partial index can be constructed.
trans-unit.target: SQLite 对如何构造部分索引施加了限制。

trans-unit.source: SQLite can fetch results in batches using fetchmany(), but since SQLite doesn’t provide isolation between queries within a connection, be careful when writing to the table being iterated over. See Isolation when using QuerySet.iterator() for more information.
trans-unit.target: SQLite可以使用 fetchmany() 批量获取结果，但是由于SQLite并未在连接内的查询之间提供隔离，因此在写入要迭代的表时要小心。有关更多信息，请参见使用QuerySet.iterator（）时的隔离。

trans-unit.source: SQLite can’t handle aggregation on date/time fields out of the box. This is because there are no native date/time fields in SQLite and Django currently emulates these features using a text field. Attempts to use aggregation on date/time fields in SQLite will raise NotImplementedError.
trans-unit.target: SQLite无法开箱即用地处理日期/时间字段上的聚合。这是因为SQLite中没有本地日期/时间字段，并且Django当前使用文本字段来模拟这些功能。尝试在SQLite中的日期/时间字段上使用聚合将引发 NotImplementedError 。

trans-unit.source: SQLite can’t handle aggregation on date/time fields out of the box. This is because there are no native date/time fields in SQLite and Django currently emulates these features using a text field. Attempts to use aggregation on date/time fields in SQLite will raise NotSupportedError.
trans-unit.target: SQLite无法开箱即用地处理日期/时间字段上的聚合。这是因为SQLite中没有本地日期/时间字段，并且Django当前使用文本字段来模拟这些功能。尝试在SQLite中的日期/时间字段上使用聚合将引发 NotSupportedError 。

trans-unit.source: SQLite does not support the SELECT ... FOR UPDATE syntax. Calling it will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: SQLite不支持 SELECT ... FOR UPDATE 语法。调用它不会有任何效果。

trans-unit.source: SQLite doesn’t support case-sensitive LIKE statements; contains acts like icontains for SQLite. See the database note for more information.
trans-unit.target: SQLite不支持区分大小写的 LIKE 语句。 contains 类似SQLite的 icontains 的行为。有关更多信息，请参见数据库注释。

trans-unit.source: SQLite doesn’t support case-sensitive LIKE statements; endswith acts like iendswith for SQLite. Refer to the database note documentation for more.
trans-unit.target: SQLite不支持区分大小写的 LIKE 语句。对于SQLite， endswith 的行为类似于 iendswith 。有关更多信息，请参考数据库注释文档。

trans-unit.source: SQLite doesn’t support case-sensitive LIKE statements; startswith acts like istartswith for SQLite.
trans-unit.target: SQLite不支持区分大小写的 LIKE 语句。对于SQLite， startswith 的行为类似于 istartswith 。

trans-unit.source: SQLite has no real decimal internal type. Decimal values are internally converted to the REAL data type (8-byte IEEE floating point number), as explained in the SQLite datatypes documentation, so they don’t support correctly-rounded decimal floating point arithmetic.
trans-unit.target: SQLite没有实际的十进制内部类型。如SQLite数据类型文档所述，十进制值在内部转换为 REAL 数据类型（8字节IEEE浮点数），因此它们不支持正确舍入的十进制浮点算术。

trans-unit.source: SQLite has very little built-in schema alteration support, and so Django attempts to emulate it by:
trans-unit.target: SQLite几乎没有内置的模式改变支持,因此Django试图通过以下方式进行模仿。

trans-unit.source: SQLite is meant to be a lightweight database, and thus can’t support a high level of concurrency. OperationalError: database is locked errors indicate that your application is experiencing more concurrency than sqlite can handle in default configuration. This error means that one thread or process has an exclusive lock on the database connection and another thread timed out waiting for the lock the be released.
trans-unit.target: SQLite是一个轻量级的数据库，因此不支持高级别的并发性。 OperationalError: database is locked 错误，表明您的应用程序并发性高于 sqlite 在默认配置下无法处理的并发性。此错误意味着一个线程或进程在数据库连接上具有排他锁，而另一个线程超时，等待释放该锁。

trans-unit.source: Savepoints
trans-unit.target: Savepoints

trans-unit.source: Savepoints (i.e. nested atomic() blocks) are handled correctly. That is, an on_commit() callable registered after a savepoint (in a nested atomic() block) will be called after the outer transaction is committed, but not if a rollback to that savepoint or any previous savepoint occurred during the transaction:
trans-unit.target: 保存点（即嵌套的 atomic() 块）已正确处理。也就是说，在 on_commit() 外部事务后，将在保存点之后（嵌套的 atomic() 块中）注册一个on_commit（）可调用对象，但在事务处理期间回滚到该保存点或之前的任何保存点时，则不会调用该方法：

trans-unit.source: Savepoints are controlled by three functions in django.db.transaction:
trans-unit.target: 保存点由 django.db.transaction 中的三个函数控制：

trans-unit.source: Savepoints aren’t especially useful if you are using autocommit, the default behavior of Django. However, once you open a transaction with atomic(), you build up a series of database operations awaiting a commit or rollback. If you issue a rollback, the entire transaction is rolled back. Savepoints provide the ability to perform a fine-grained rollback, rather than the full rollback that would be performed by transaction.rollback().
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用自动提交（Django的默认行为），则保存点不是特别有用。但是，一旦使用 atomic() 打开事务，便会建立一系列等待提交或回滚的数据库操作。如果发出回滚，则会回滚整个事务。保存点提供了执行细粒度回滚的功能，而不是由 transaction.rollback() 进行的完整回滚。

trans-unit.source: Savepoints in SQLite
trans-unit.target: SQLite中的保存点

trans-unit.source: Savepoints may be used to recover from a database error by performing a partial rollback. If you’re doing this inside an atomic() block, the entire block will still be rolled back, because it doesn’t know you’ve handled the situation at a lower level! To prevent this, you can control the rollback behavior with the following functions.
trans-unit.target: 保存点可用于通过执行部分回滚来从数据库错误中恢复。如果您在 atomic() 块内执行此操作，则整个块仍将回滚，因为它不知道您已在较低级别上处理了该情况！为防止这种情况，可以使用以下功能控制回滚行为。

trans-unit.source: Second, the lookup doesn’t guarantee that only one object will be returned. If the query matches more than one object, it will retrieve and transfer all of them from the database. This penalty could be substantial if hundreds or thousands of records are returned. The penalty will be compounded if the database lives on a separate server, where network overhead and latency also play a factor.
trans-unit.target: 其次，查找并不能保证只返回一个对象。如果查询与多个对象匹配，它将从数据库中检索并传输所有这些对象。如果返回成百上千的记录，则可能会产生巨大的损失。如果数据库位于单独的服务器上，则损失会更加复杂，因为网络开销和延迟也是其中一个因素。

trans-unit.source: Secondly, the GroupAdmin must manually exclude the members field. Django displays an admin widget for a many-to-many field on the model that defines the relation (in this case, Group). If you want to use an inline model to represent the many-to-many relationship, you must tell Django’s admin to not display this widget - otherwise you will end up with two widgets on your admin page for managing the relation.
trans-unit.target: 其次， GroupAdmin 必须手动排除 members 字段。Django在模型上为定义关系的多对多字段显示一个管理小部件（在本例中为 Group ）。如果要使用内联模型表示多对多关系，则必须告诉Django的管理员不要显示此窗口小部件-否则，您最终将在管理页面上使用两个窗口小部件来管理该关系。

trans-unit.source: Security in Django
trans-unit.target: Django的安全性

trans-unit.source: Security is a topic of paramount importance in the development of Web applications and Django provides multiple protection tools and mechanisms:
trans-unit.target: 安全性是Web应用开发中最重要的话题,Django提供了多种保护工具和机制。

trans-unit.source: Security middleware
trans-unit.target: 安全中间件

trans-unit.source: Security overview
trans-unit.target: 安保概览

trans-unit.source: Security researchers recently revealed that when compression techniques (including GZipMiddleware) are used on a website, the site may become exposed to a number of possible attacks. Before using GZipMiddleware on your site, you should consider very carefully whether you are subject to these attacks. If you’re in any doubt about whether you’re affected, you should avoid using GZipMiddleware. For more details, see the the BREACH paper (PDF) and breachattack.com.
trans-unit.target: 安全研究人员最近透露，在网站上使用压缩技术（包括 GZipMiddleware ）时，该网站可能会受到多种可能的攻击。在您的站点上使用 GZipMiddleware 之前，您应该非常仔细地考虑是否受到这些攻击。如果你是任何有关是否会影响任何疑问，应避免使用 GZipMiddleware 。有关更多详细信息，请参见BREACH论文（PDF）和Breakattack.com。

trans-unit.source: Sent by the migrate command before it starts to install an application. It’s not emitted for applications that lack a models module.

trans-unit.source: Sent when Django begins processing an HTTP request.

trans-unit.source: Sent when Django finishes delivering an HTTP response to the client.
trans-unit.target: 当Django完成向客户端发送HTTP响应时发送。

trans-unit.source: Sent when Django starts or finishes an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 当Django开始或完成一个HTTP请求时发送。

trans-unit.source: Sent when a ManyToManyField on a model is changed.
trans-unit.target: 更改模型上的 ManyToManyField 时发送。

trans-unit.source: Sent when a ManyToManyField is changed on a model instance. Strictly speaking, this is not a model signal since it is sent by the ManyToManyField, but since it complements the pre_save/post_save and pre_delete/post_delete when it comes to tracking changes to models, it is included here.
trans-unit.target: 在模型实例上更改 ManyToManyField 时发送。严格来说，这不是模型信号，因为它是由 ManyToManyField 发送的，但是由于它在跟踪模型更改时对 pre_save / post_save 和 pre_delete / post_delete 进行了补充，因此包含在此处。

trans-unit.source: Sent when a user logs in successfully.

trans-unit.source: Sent when the database wrapper makes the initial connection to the database. This is particularly useful if you’d like to send any post connection commands to the SQL backend.
trans-unit.target: 当数据库包装器与数据库建立初始连接时发送。如果您想将任何连接后命令发送到SQL后端，则此功能特别有用。

trans-unit.source: Sent when the logout method is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用注销方法时发送。

trans-unit.source: Sent when the test system renders a template. This signal is not emitted during normal operation of a Django server – it is only available during testing.
trans-unit.target: 在测试系统呈现模板时发送。在Django服务器正常运行期间不会发出此信号-仅在测试期间可用。

trans-unit.source: Sent when the user failed to login successfully
trans-unit.target: 当用户未能成功登录时发送

trans-unit.source: Sent whenever a model class has been “prepared” – that is, once model has been defined and registered with Django’s model system. Django uses this signal internally; it’s not generally used in third-party applications.
trans-unit.target: 每当“准备”了模型类时即在定义了模型并向Django的模型系统注册后发送。Django内部使用此信号。它通常不在第三方应用程序中使用。

trans-unit.source: Serious errors will prevent Django commands (such as runserver) from running at all. Minor problems are reported to the console. If you have inspected the cause of a warning and are happy to ignore it, you can hide specific warnings using the SILENCED_SYSTEM_CHECKS setting in your project settings file.
trans-unit.target: 严重的错误将完全阻止Django命令（例如 runserver ）运行。轻微问题报告给控制台。如果您已检查警告的原因并乐于忽略它，则可以使用项目设置文件中的 SILENCED_SYSTEM_CHECKS 设置来隐藏特定的警告。

trans-unit.source: Server checks to see if the resource has changed, by computing the ETag the same way it does for a GET request (using the same function). If the resource has changed, it will return a 412 status code, meaning “precondition failed”.
trans-unit.target: 服务器通过使用与 GET 请求相同的方式（使用相同的功能）计算ETag，以检查资源是否已更改。如果资源已更改，它将返回412状态代码，表示“前提条件失败”。

trans-unit.source: Server error emails are sent using the logging framework, so you can customize this behavior by customizing your logging configuration.
trans-unit.target: 服务器错误电子邮件是使用日志记录框架发送的，因此您可以通过自定义日志记录配置来自定义此行为。

trans-unit.source: Server-side caching will reduce CPU load. It’s easily implemented with the cache_page() decorator. To trigger cache invalidation when your translations change, provide a version-dependent key prefix, as shown in the example below, or map the view at a version-dependent URL:
trans-unit.target: 服务器端缓存将减少CPU负载。使用 cache_page() 装饰器很容易实现。要在翻译更改时触发缓存失效，请提供与版本相关的键前缀（如下例所示），或将视图映射到与版本相关的URL：

trans-unit.source: Server-side cursors
trans-unit.target: 服务器端光标

trans-unit.source: Server-side cursors are local to a connection and remain open at the end of a transaction when AUTOCOMMIT is True. A subsequent transaction may attempt to fetch more results from a server-side cursor. In transaction pooling mode, there’s no guarantee that subsequent transactions will use the same connection. If a different connection is used, an error is raised when the transaction references the server-side cursor, because server-side cursors are only accessible in the connection in which they were created.
trans-unit.target: 服务器端游标在连接本地，在 AUTOCOMMIT 为 True 时在事务结束时保持打开状态。后续事务可能会尝试从服务器端游标中获取更多结果。在事务池模式下，不能保证后续事务将使用相同的连接。如果使用其他连接，则事务引用服务器端游标时会引发错误，因为服务器端游标只能在创建它们的连接中访问。

trans-unit.source: Set SESSION_ENGINE to "django.contrib.sessions.backends.cache" for a simple caching session store. Session data will be stored directly in your cache. However, session data may not be persistent: cached data can be evicted if the cache fills up or if the cache server is restarted.
trans-unit.target: 将 SESSION_ENGINE 设置为 "django.contrib.sessions.backends.cache" 以获取简单的缓存会话存储。会话数据将直接存储在您的缓存中。但是，会话数据可能不是永久性的：如果缓存已满或重新启动了缓存服务器，则可以将缓存的数据逐出。

trans-unit.source: Set BACKEND to django.core.cache.backends.db.DatabaseCache
trans-unit.target: 将 BACKEND 设置为 django.core.cache.backends.db.DatabaseCache

trans-unit.source: Set BACKEND to django.core.cache.backends.memcached.MemcachedCache or django.core.cache.backends.memcached.PyLibMCCache (depending on your chosen memcached binding)
trans-unit.target: 将 BACKEND 设置为 django.core.cache.backends.memcached.MemcachedCache 或 django.core.cache.backends.memcached.PyLibMCCache （取决于您选择的memcached绑定）

trans-unit.source: Set LOCATION to ip:port values, where ip is the IP address of the Memcached daemon and port is the port on which Memcached is running, or to a unix:path value, where path is the path to a Memcached Unix socket file.
trans-unit.target: 设置 LOCATION 到 ip:port 值，其中 ip 是Memcached的守护进程的IP地址， port 是其Memcached的运行，或者一个端口 unix:path 值，其中 path 是路径到Memcached的Unix套接字文件。

trans-unit.source: Set LOCATION to tablename, the name of the database table. This name can be whatever you want, as long as it’s a valid table name that’s not already being used in your database.
trans-unit.target: 将 LOCATION 设置为 tablename ，即数据库表的名称。该名称可以是您想要的任何名称，只要它是数据库中尚未使用的有效表名即可。

trans-unit.source: Set SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT to True, so that requests over HTTP are redirected to HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 将 SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT 设置为 True ，以便将通过HTTP的请求重定向到HTTPS。

trans-unit.source: Set BACKEND to 'django.template.backends.django.DjangoTemplates' to configure a Django template engine.
trans-unit.target: 将 BACKEND 设置为 'django.template.backends.django.DjangoTemplates' 以配置Django模板引擎。

trans-unit.source: Set BACKEND to 'django.template.backends.jinja2.Jinja2' to configure a Jinja2 engine.
trans-unit.target: 将 BACKEND 设置为 'django.template.backends.jinja2.Jinja2' 以配置Jinja2引擎。

trans-unit.source: Set BACKEND to 'django.template.backends.jinja2.Jinja2' to configure a Jinja2 engine.
trans-unit.target: 将 BACKEND 设置为 'django.template.backends.jinja2.Jinja2' 以配置Jinja2引擎。

trans-unit.source: Set date_hierarchy to the name of a DateField or DateTimeField in your model, and the change list page will include a date-based drilldown navigation by that field.
trans-unit.target: 将 date_hierarchy 设置为模型中的 DateField 或 DateTimeField 的名称，更改列表页面将包括该字段的基于日期的向下钻取导航。

trans-unit.source: Set fieldsets to control the layout of admin “add” and “change” pages.
trans-unit.target: 设置 fieldsets 集以控制管理员“添加”和“更改”页面的布局。

trans-unit.source: Set html to True to handle text as HTML. The comparison with the response content will be based on HTML semantics instead of character-by-character equality. Whitespace is ignored in most cases, attribute ordering is not significant. See assertHTMLEqual() for more details.
trans-unit.target: 将 html 设置为 True 可将 text 作为HTML 处理。与响应内容的比较将基于HTML语义，而不是逐个字符的相等。在大多数情况下，空格会被忽略，属性顺序并不重要。有关更多详细信息，请参见 assertHTMLEqual() 。

trans-unit.source: Set list_display to control which fields are displayed on the change list page of the admin.
trans-unit.target: 设置 list_display 以控制在管理员的更改列表页面上显示哪些字段。

trans-unit.source: Set list_editable to a list of field names on the model which will allow editing on the change list page. That is, fields listed in list_editable will be displayed as form widgets on the change list page, allowing users to edit and save multiple rows at once.
trans-unit.target: 将 list_editable 设置为模型上字段名称的列表，这将允许在更改列表页面上进行编辑。也就是说， list_editable 中列出的字段将在更改列表页面上显示为表单小部件，从而允许用户一次编辑和保存多行。

trans-unit.source: Set list_filter to activate filters in the right sidebar of the change list page of the admin, as illustrated in the following screenshot:
trans-unit.target: 设置 list_filter 以激活管理员更改列表页面右侧栏中的过滤器，如以下屏幕截图所示：

trans-unit.source: Set list_max_show_all to control how many items can appear on a “Show all” admin change list page. The admin will display a “Show all” link on the change list only if the total result count is less than or equal to this setting. By default, this is set to 200.
trans-unit.target: 设置 list_max_show_all 以控制在“显示全部”管理员更改列表页面上可以显示多少个项目。仅当总结果计数小于或等于此设置时，管理员才会在更改列表上显示“显示全部”链接。默认情况下，它设置为 200 。

trans-unit.source: Set list_per_page to control how many items appear on each paginated admin change list page. By default, this is set to 100.
trans-unit.target: 设置 list_per_page 以控制在每个分页的管理员更改列表页面上显示多少个项目。默认情况下，它设置为 100 。

trans-unit.source: Set list_select_related to tell Django to use select_related() in retrieving the list of objects on the admin change list page. This can save you a bunch of database queries.
trans-unit.target: 设置 list_select_related ,以告知Django 在检索管理员更改列表页面上的对象列表时使用select_related select_related() 。这样可以为您节省大量数据库查询。

trans-unit.source: Set ordering to specify how lists of objects should be ordered in the Django admin views. This should be a list or tuple in the same format as a model’s ordering parameter.
trans-unit.target: 设置 ordering 以指定应如何在Django管理视图中对对象列表进行排序。这应该是与模型的 ordering 参数格式相同的列表或元组。

trans-unit.source: Set ordering_widget to specify the widget class to be used with can_order:
trans-unit.target: 设置 ordering_widget 以指定可与 can_order 一起使用的窗口小部件类：

trans-unit.source: Set prepopulated_fields to a dictionary mapping field names to the fields it should prepopulate from:
trans-unit.target: 将 prepopulated_fields 设置为字典，将字段名称映射到应从中预填充的字段：

trans-unit.source: Set save_as to enable a “save as new” feature on admin change forms.
trans-unit.target: 设置 save_as 以在管理员更改表单上启用“另存为”功能。

trans-unit.source: Set save_on_top to add save buttons across the top of your admin change forms.
trans-unit.target: 设置 save_on_top 以在您的管理员更改表单顶部添加保存按钮。

trans-unit.source: Set search_fields to enable a search box on the admin change list page. This should be set to a list of field names that will be searched whenever somebody submits a search query in that text box.
trans-unit.target: 设置 search_fields 以在管理员更改列表页面上启用搜索框。这应该设置为一个字段名列表，只要有人在该文本框中提交搜索查询，就将对其进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: Set show_full_result_count to control whether the full count of objects should be displayed on a filtered admin page (e.g. 99 results (103 total)). If this option is set to False, a text like 99 results (Show all) is displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 设置 show_full_result_count 以控制是否应在过滤的管理页面上显示对象的全部计数（例如 99 results (103 total) ）。如果此选项设置为 False ，则会显示类似 99 results (Show all) 显示）的文本。

trans-unit.source: Set view_on_site to control whether or not to display the “View on site” link. This link should bring you to a URL where you can display the saved object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 view_on_site 以控制是否显示“现场查看”链接。该链接应带您到一个URL，您可以在其中显示保存的对象。

trans-unit.target: 将 ForeignKey 设置为其默认值；必须为 ForeignKey 设置默认值。

trans-unit.source: Set the ForeignKey to the value passed to SET(), or if a callable is passed in, the result of calling it. In most cases, passing a callable will be necessary to avoid executing queries at the time your models.py is imported:
trans-unit.target: 将 ForeignKey 设置为传递给 SET() 的值，或者如果传递了可调用对象，则为调用它的结果。在大多数情况下，有必要传递一个callable，以避免在导入models.py时执行查询：

trans-unit.source: Set the ENGINE setting to one of the spatial backends.
trans-unit.target: 将 ENGINE 设置为空间后端之一。

trans-unit.source: Set the TIME_ZONE option to the appropriate time zone for this database in the DATABASES setting.
trans-unit.target: 在 DATABASES 设置中，将 TIME_ZONE 选项设置为此数据库的适当时区。

trans-unit.target: 将 autosummarize 参数设置为 True ,以启用autovacuum执行自动汇总。

trans-unit.source: Set the buffering parameter to True or False to manually enable or disable buffering build of the index.
trans-unit.target: 将 buffering 参数设置为 True 或 False ,以手动启用或禁用索引的缓冲构建。

trans-unit.source: Set the cover_density parameter to True to enable the cover density ranking, which means that the proximity of matching query terms is taken into account.
trans-unit.target: 将 cover_density 参数设置为 True 以启用覆盖密度排名，这意味着要考虑匹配查询词的接近性。

trans-unit.target: 将 ModelForm 的内部 Meta 类的 exclude 属性设置为要从表单中排除的字段列表。

trans-unit.source: Set the fastupdate parameter to False to disable the GIN Fast Update Technique that’s enabled by default in PostgreSQL.
trans-unit.target: 将 fastupdate 参数设置为 False 可以禁用PostgreSQL默认启用的GIN快速更新技术。

trans-unit.source: Set the fields attribute to the special value '__all__' to indicate that all fields in the model should be used. For example:
trans-unit.target: 将 fields 属性设置为特殊值 '__all__' 以指示应使用模型中的所有字段。例如：

trans-unit.source: Set the fragment_delimiter string parameter to configure the delimiter between fragments. PostgreSQL’s default is " ... ".
trans-unit.target: 设置 fragment_delimiter 字符串参数以配置片段之间的分隔符。PostgreSQL的默认值为 " ... " 。

trans-unit.source: Set the highlight_all parameter to True to use the whole document in place of a fragment and ignore max_words, min_words, and short_word parameters. That’s disabled by default in PostgreSQL.
trans-unit.target: 将 highlight_all 参数设置为 True 可以代替片段使用整个文档，并忽略 max_words ， min_words 和 short_word 参数。在PostgreSQL中默认禁用。

trans-unit.source: Set the start_sel and stop_sel parameters to the string values to be used to wrap highlighted query terms in the document. PostgreSQL’s defaults are <b> and </b>.
trans-unit.target: 将 start_sel 和 stop_sel 参数设置为用于在文档中包装突出显示的查询词的字符串值。PostgreSQL的默认值为 <b> 和 </b> 。

trans-unit.target: 再把地方定回来,用赋值的方式反过来。

trans-unit.target: 使用赋值符号设置地点。因为地方是餐厅的主键,所以保存后会创建一个新的餐厅。

trans-unit.source: Set this to False if you want to disable Django’s transaction management and implement your own.
trans-unit.target: 如果要禁用Django的事务管理并实现自己的事务，请将其设置为 False 。

trans-unit.source: Set this to True if you want the bounding box to be included in the returned GeoJSON. Ignored on Oracle.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望将边界框包含在返回的GeoJSON中，请将其设置为 True 。在Oracle上被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Set this to True if you want the coordinate reference system to be included in the returned GeoJSON. Ignored on MySQL and Oracle.

trans-unit.target: 如果希望将坐标参考系统包含在返回的GeoJSON中，请将其设置为 True 。在MySQL上被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Set this to True if you want to disable the use of server-side cursors with QuerySet.iterator(). Transaction pooling and server-side cursors describes the use case.
trans-unit.target: 如果要通过 QuerySet.iterator() 禁用服务器端游标，请将其设置为 True 。事务池和服务器端游标描述了用例。

trans-unit.source: Set this to True to avoid transmitting the CSRF cookie over HTTP accidentally.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为 True 可以避免意外地通过HTTP传输CSRF cookie。

trans-unit.source: Set this to True to avoid transmitting the session cookie over HTTP accidentally.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为 True 可以避免通过HTTP意外传输会话cookie。

trans-unit.source: Set this to True to wrap each view in a transaction on this database. See Tying transactions to HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为 True 可将每个视图包装在该数据库的事务中。请参见将事务绑定到HTTP请求。
